followuser.export_description: Exports details of users followed and users following.
followuser.delete_description: Deletes all data related to following users.

settings.button-on-profile-label: Show the Follow button directly on the user profile header
settings.stats-on-profile-label: Show follower and following counts on user profiles

profile_page.no_following: It looks like you're not following anyone.
profile_page.no_followers: It looks like you have no followers yet.

settings.notify_new_discussion_label: Someone I'm following starts a discussion
settings.notify_new_post_label: Someone I'm following posts in an existing discussion

select_follow_level.title: Select follow level for {username}
select_follow_level.description: Choose how you'd like to follow {username}.
select_follow_level.no_user_attr_provided_err: Uh oh, something went wrong while opening this modal.
select_follow_level.no_user_attr_provided_err_debug: No `user` attribute was passed to the SelectFollowUserLevel modal when created. Modal cannot be rendered.

plain.body:
{follower_display_name} started following you, so they'll be notified when you start a new discussion.

{profile_url}

html.body: {follower_display_name} started following you, so they'll be notified when you start a new discussion.

unfollow.name: Don't follow
unfollow.description: Don't receive any notifications for {username}'s activity.

follow.name: Follow discussions
follow.description: Receive notifications when {username} starts new a new discussion.

lurk.name: Follow all
lurk.description: Receive notifications when {username} starts a new discussion or posts within any discussion.
